directions: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic; cook and stir until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add chicken; cook and stir until no longer pink, about 5 minutes. Stir in oyster sauce, soy sauce, and sugar. Stir in chile peppers. Pour in water. Cook until slightly thickened, 3 to 5 minutes. Stir in basil before serving.
ingredients: 1 large skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut into 1-inch pieces
title: Authentic Thai Basil Chicken (Very Easy and Fast)
